name: Sweet and Sour Pork
author: S.M.P

ingredients.name: (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks and juice

instructions: In large skillet, brown pork in oil. Remove. Mix cornstarch with Juice from pineapple; add to skillet. Add vinegar, brown sugar and soy sauce. Stir over low heat until clear and thick. Add pineapple and pork. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Add green pepper and cook 1 to 2 minutes more, just enough to heat through and heighten color. Serve over hot cooked rice.
